body:
Comment 2 by **achun.SHX**: 
We often uses reflect.ValueOf to identify the type of data that get from database, but
templete.Execute() funtion doesn't accept type reflect.Value as arguments, so we have to
use Value.Interface again in order to pass the argument. However, template uses
reflect.ValueOf for its arguments in its function body, why cannot we just pass
reflect.Value?
